评论详情: I bought this shirt under the impression that the lace part at the top came with it.  Well, it DOES NOT COME WITH THE SHIRT lol.  The only lace part of my shirt is the fabric around the buttons.  Although the shirt fits nicely and is soft, I don’t understand why the picture shows the lacy part along with the shirt — if it is not what you’re paying for??  I think they need to redo the whole page here …. Just showing what we are spending our money on!!
Rip off!! Cheap material and the lace kept falling, buttons broke easily and sizing was off.
Hermosa la blusa excelente calidad me llego súper bien y es tal cual la imagen
Ordered and arrived within a couple days. Perfect size- she loves it!
My daughter loves this for her birthday.  Lots of compliments.

I couldn’t even upload an image of it because it showed too much skin. Do not recommend please do not buy and it’s very low quality different from the picture different color. If you don’t like the color lighter then you should get the shirt but if you like it like bright colors, it is bright colors. I don’t really like it do not recommend if you are under the age of 13

This was absolutely nothing like the photos. Size does not match, and it is just unfortunately cheaply made. And yes, it IS see though. My daughter also says it felt scratchy for some reason. I do not recommend.
Very low quality, doesn’t look as posted, and it’s unflattering. Makes you waist look wider than it is. Would give 0 stars if possible. Don’t waste your time on this.

Good transaction
Very nice. Bought this for our daughter. She liked it

Love the color and style.

The shirt feels and looks great. There was only one problem with it..THE BUTTONS WOULD NOT STAY CLOSED! I had to keep closing them. Its still a cute shirt, but it gets annoying. Overall, This shirt is cute and stylish
literally fell apart before i even wore it

My daughter picked this out. When it came it was super cute but too small on her. We bought two sizes bigger the next time and although it fit her body, it was extremely tight in the arms so we had to return it. If you have super small arms then you will love it because it really is adorable! Love the lace!
Pic is cute, but shirt not cute irl. It runs very small and the material is weird and scratchy.

Terrible. So bad

The buttons on mine just wouldn’t really stay, plus the material was definitely cheap because when I was taking it off the one seam dripped on my arm because of how I pulled it. Overall it was just flimsy and not worth the 20 dollars.
Ordered an extra large.  Typically that size fits perfectly.  This was small.  It is tight in the arms and the bottom end rolls up a lot.  Love the look, hate the fit.

The color wasn’t even a match to what was advertised, the shirt looked nothing like what was shown, the lace part not only was see thru it was holding the sturdy fabric together, even when buttoned. The size was small. Was not small, was way bigger. Cheap, not quality, save your money.
The material is super CRAZY THIN, and it's very loose around the waist too, so it doesn't hug your waist/body like the pictures
Cheap fabric like something you would buy on wish. Did not fit well. Could only see it holding up for one wear
Very nice shirt but the buttonholes were made too big and the small little buttons won't stay shut so I had to fix

I like this shirt! Keeps me warm now that it's getting colder out. I layer this shirt with bigger t-shirts or just wear it on its own and it's a beautiful top. Overall, I have nothing to complain about. I like that the shirt clings to your body and is sort of skin tight. It looks really good!

shirt is very tight and the colors are not what it looks like in the pictures, shirt is very see-through the the sewing is terrible, not to mention when you button it up it unbuttons VERY easily. do NOT buy.
The shirt is cute but they run small and it was tight on me. A little transparent
This shirt is legitimately a scam it was just a paper towel like material that is sewn to a piece of lace the shirt ripped immediately and I'm 100 lb so cheap quality

so i usually get a large but when it arrived and i tried it on, the sleeves were way too small. the stitching is also weird which makes it uncomfortable and the lace isn’t stitched on correctly which makes it go up and down
This shirt is so cute and light weight I loved the color and how it fits perfectly definitely will be buying again

I wasted $25 on the black shirt with white lace underneath it’s horrible. The fabric is itchy and thin it’s so poorly made. buy at your own risk
